name: Call Me Hand
baseMeaning: A hand with thumb and pinky extended, like a phone or shaka sign.
tldr: Call me, hang loose, or chill vibes. The surfer/Hawaiian shaka.

contextMeanings.meaning: Suggesting a phone call or being chill.

contextMeanings.example: All good, we'll figure it out

platformNotes.note: Popular in beach, surf, and vacation content.
Used to convey relaxed, positive energy.

seoTitle: Call Me Hand Emoji Meaning - What Does  Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the call me hand emoji  really means in texting. Hang loose vibes or call me. Complete context guide.
